name: Rotygon
description:
Movement - [A] & [D] (or Right & Left Arrows)

Move around to dodge the obstacles!

Disclaimer: The game has screen flashes with different colors that may be discomforting for some people.

Use headphones for better experience. (You might want to lower the sound from the sound mixer since I didn't do a good job at fixing the volume ^^)

Apologies in advance if there is any inconveniences. I'll make sure to address them after the game jam.

I would appreciate any feedback!
